name: Pardon My French Toast
summary:
In Pardon My French Toast, you play as a Toasty (a talking slice of brioche) who dreams of participating in the new edition of the bread wrestling competition. To be physically up to the challenge, he decides to follow a training program organized by the previous champion of the discipline, which will take him all over the world and make him meet a bunch of wacky weirdos.

Pardon My French Toast is an adventure / platform game in 2D top view in which the player explores different worlds, solves puzzles and meets a whole bunch of fun characters. Bread wrestling is a... special sport. We will introduce the discipline later.
